sec.p: We counted the number of species that each participant grabbed during the underwater experience [( M = 10.22; SD = 14.17), min = 0, max = 116.0]. This measure differed, however, from the number of species that participants put into their collection buckets [( M = 3.90; SD = 3.57), min = 0, max = 21]. These items were highly correlated (œÅ = 0.74, p < 0.001) and we therefore combined these scores into a standardized index called search activity to evaluate participant overall interactivity level during the species count.
